Literature.Title: Synthesis, antimicrobial activity and conformational analysis of the class IIa bacteriocin pediocin PA-1 and analogs thereof.
Literature.Author: Bédard F, Hammami R, Zirah S, Rebuffat S, Fliss I, Biron É

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Listeria ivanovii HPB 28(MIC=0.027µM),Listeria monocytogenes LSD 530(MIC=0.027µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19111(MIC=0.027µM),Pediococcus acidilactici UL5(no activity data)
